tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FoodSupplyChain (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    origin TEXT NOT NULL,
    production_practices TEXT,
    transportation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS product_info (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    weight DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    origin_id INT NOT NULL,
    practice_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (origin_id) REFERENCES origin_info(origin_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (practice_id) REFERENCES production_practices(practice_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS transportation_info (
    transport_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transport_mode VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    route_details TEXT NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES product_info(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE food_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    origin_id INT,
    practice_id INT,
    transport_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (origin_id) REFERENCES origin(origin_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (practice_id) REFERENCES production_practices(practice_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (transport_id) REFERENCES transportation(transport_id)
);
